name: Bat
description: A tiny, nocturnal mammal with membranous wings that allow it to fly silently through the night.
memorable: Bats use echolocation to navigate and often appear in large swarms that can disorient unprepared travelers.
goals: Searching for insects to eat, often dwelling in dark areas like caves or forests.
relations: Often found in dark environments and may serve as a food source for larger predators.
environment: Dark caves, forests, in swarms, often associated with eerie locations.
strengths: Possesses echolocation for navigation and keen hearing for enhanced perception.
weaknesses: Extremely low hit points and armor class, making it very easy to defeat.
attacks: Can perform a bite attack dealing 1 piercing damage; effective in swarming targets.
most_powerful_ability: Echolocation allows it to navigate and detect creatures by sound.
senses: Has blindsight to 60 ft. and can detect nearby creatures in darkness.
skills: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing due to keen hearing.
additional_information: Can navigate dark caves and forests effectively.
May serve as a minor nuisance but is harmless on its own.
Typically encountered as environmental detail or minor obstacle early in campaigns.
test_queries: swarms of bats in dark caves
